mapper.select: select gw.fID as fid, gw.fPostName as fpostName, gw.fPostxmid2 as fpostxmid2 from pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm_3gw gw , pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm xm where xm.fID=gw.fPostxmid and gw.fPostxmid1 is not null and xm.fMasterID=#{0} and xm.fWriteID=#{1}

select gw.fID as fid, gw.fPostWriteID as fpostWriteId, gwx.fID as px3_fid, gwx.fPostName as px3_fPostName from pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm_3gw gw left join pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm_3gw gwx on gw.fPostxmid2 = gwx.fPostxmid1 ,pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm xm where xm.fID=gw.fPostxmid and gwx.fPostName is not null and xm.fMasterID=#{ProjectId}

select gw.fID as fid, gw.fPostWriteID as fpostWriteId, gwx.fID as px3_fid, gwx.fPostWriteID as px3_fpostWriteId , gwx.fPostName as px3_fpostName from pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm_3gw gw , pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm_3gw gwx where gw.fPostxmid1=gwx.fPostxmid2 and gw.fID=#{fID}

select gw.fID as px3_fid, gwx.fID as fid, gwx.fPostName as fpostName from pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm_3gw gw , pm_project_project_informationtable_postsetb_xm_3gw gwx where gw.fPostxmid1=gwx.fPostxmid2 and gw.fID=#{fID}
